original_title: The Corrs: BBC Radio 2 Live at Hyde Park
overview: The Corrs return for an exclusive appearance, their first in more than a decade, at the Radio 2 Live in Hyde Park on Sunday 13th September 2015.  Setlist:  01 Intro, 02 Breathless 01:19, 03 Runaway 05:01, 04 Dreams 10:05, 05 What Can I Do 15:34, 06 Radio 20:06, 07 Toss The Feathers 25:06
title: The Corrs: BBC Radio 2 Live at Hyde Park
